user_query: about great movies and digging into why they work then make sure to subscribe you can also support this channel on patreon if you're a Paul Thomas Anderson found like me make sure you check out my video on there will be blood thanks for watching and I'll see you in the next video for the pursuit of happiness

entities.entity_description: Paul Thomas Anderson은 영화 감독으로, 화자가 팬임을 밝힌 인물이다
There Will Be Blood는 Paul Thomas Anderson 감독의 영화로, 화자가 관련 영상을 제작한 작품이다
The Pursuit of Happiness는 다음 영상에서 다룰 예정인 영화이다
